'''Concini''' is a mentioned character and the boss of [[Loillier]]. He is a merchant that hails from [[Snezhnaya]].<ref name='aep'>{{Ref/Quest|An Expected Plan}}</ref>

==Profile==
Concini had been shipping household goods and materials from [[Lumidouce Harbor]]. He and [[Nacker]] were working together, and he sent Nacker to Fontaine from Lumidouce Harbor.<ref name='aep' />

Concini and Loillier are financial backers of [[Edwin Eastinghouse]]'s research.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Edwin Eastinghouse}}</ref>
